title: A combination of Xavi and Iniesta  – Barcelona star Pedri given huge praise by Man Utd legend
body_text:
Barcelona midfielder Pedri has been described as a “combination of Xavi and Iniesta” by former Manchester United midfielder Paul Scholes.
‘A combination of Xavi and Iniesta’ – Barcelona star Pedri given huge praise by Man Utd legend
The Barca star has been impressing
The ex-Red Devils described Pedri as his new favorite player after seeing him play a starring role against Newcastle in the Champions League and has now piled more praise on the Spain star.
“The number 1 is Pedri. When I saw him against Newcastle , I said, ‘Wow!’... He’s like a combination of Xavi and Iniesta . We’re not just talking about his feet, but above all his football intelligence. Sometimes he finds himself in difficult situations, and the way he overcomes them with a little one-two or a shoulder feint is incredible. His technique is brilliant,” he said.
”The best thing was that when Newcastle scored, there were eight minutes of stoppage time left. I thought it was going to be exciting... But Pedri had the ball for seven of the eight minutes. He took complete control of the game. I thought it was brilliant.”
Hansi Flick was asked about Scholes’s comments at his pre-match press conference and was happy to hear his opinion. He told reporters: “When you’re an attacker, you have more focus. If Scholes says that , that he was a wonderful player, it’s a good thing. Pedri is at an incredible level, as is Frenkie. I’m very happy with what I see in training.”
